bilingual.target: 你可以找到工人机器人。

bilingual.source: After three months, the factory worker brings a big red flower.
bilingual.target: 三个月后，工厂工人带来了一朵大红花。

bilingual.source: I was wrong about the new worker. He's not from Germany.
bilingual.target: 我把那个新来的工人的情况搞错了，他不是从德国来的。

bilingual.source: One day, a rich old businessman in a small town meets a factory worker, a coach and a fisherman.
bilingual.target: 一天，一个小镇上的富有老人遇到了一名工厂工人、一名教练和一名渔夫。
他是一个非常精细的工人。

bilingual.source: The worker is replacing the furnace tube.

yingyinNormal.en: Fred has increased Martin's productivity by 40% without dismissing a single worker.
yingyinNormal.zh: 弗瑞德没有解雇马丁厂工厂的一个工人，增加了百分之四十的生产率。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, this year, I'm getting my own costume, and it's gonna be tough and manly, maybe a cowboy or a construction worker.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今年，我要自己打扮一套，打扮得很健壮，充满男子汉气概，比如牛仔或者建筑工人。

yingyinNormal.en: Dale, look, it wasn't a violent crime. I mean, I'm a good worker.
yingyinNormal.zh: 戴尔，听着，那不是暴力犯罪，我是个好员工。

yingyinNormal.en: I understand, but you need to see an immigration case worker for that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我理解,但你得先去找移民案件专员。

yingyinNormal.en: To what animals are the Formics most often compared? Ants. Which have a queen who directs the worker ants.
yingyinNormal.zh: 虫族最常被比作哪种动物？蚂蚁 蚂蚁有蚁后，她指挥工蚁。

yingyinNormal.en: We've got to make a play for Ruth Eastman. She's the miracle worker of Iowa, and she won't work with Hillary.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们得把鲁斯·伊斯曼拉拢过来，她是爱荷华的奇迹制造者，而且她不会帮希拉里做事。

yingyinNormal.en: And these aren't just high schoolers on their first job. The average worker who would benefit is 35 years old.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这不仅仅包括刚开始第一份工作的高中生。受益于此人们的平均年龄是35岁。

yingyinNormal.en: Right now, a worker on the federal minimum wage earns $7.25 an hour. It's time to raise that to $10.10 an hour.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当下,在联邦最低工资标准下,一个员工每小时可以挣到$7.25。是时候,将其提高到每小时$10.10了。

yingyinNormal.en: No, no, no. It's an exciting thing. For who? Look. Anyhow, I need a raise. I'm a hard worker. I've done good work for you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不不不，这，这是个好消息。对谁来说？总之，我，我需要加薪。我努力工作，我一直为你尽心尽力。

yingyinNormal.en: You have to get out of here. You slept with our social worker and you never called her back. She is still pissed, so she can't see you. Okay. Okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你得回避，你和这个社工睡过，再没联络她，她还在生你的气，不能让她见你。好的好的。

yingyinNormal.en: And when given a fair shot, the American worker has never, ever, ever, let his country down. Folks, it's never a good bet to bet against the American people.
yingyinNormal.zh: 美国人民希望有工作，当人们得到公平机会的时候，人民就不会，也永远不会让我们的国家倒下。朋友们，拿美国人民的福祉做赌注永远都不是什么好想法。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, Ace, we're not about to give you $10,000 so you can take advantage of a sad, underage girl worker near the loading docks 'cause her boobs are crazy big and she needs a ride home.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听好了，王牌艾斯，我们给你这一万块钱不是让你可以占心情不好的未成年女员工便宜，就是卸货区附近，那个胸器逼人需要人送回家的姑娘。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: But only 44 percent of <highlight>workers</highlight> are adequately trained.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但只有 44% 的工人接受过充分培训。

examination_example.sentence: When the recovery began, <highlight>worker</highlight> shortages first appeared in the high-skilled trades.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当（制造业）复苏开始的时候，首先缺乏的就是高级技工。

examination_example.sentence: A quarter of America's public-sector <highlight>workers</highlight> have a university degree.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国四分之一的公共部门工作人员拥有大学学位。

examination_example.sentence: The premise was that the common law of contract lacked sufficient safeguards for <highlight>workers</highlight> against arbitrary conduct by management.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其前提是，普通合同法缺乏足够的保障措施来保护工人免受管理层的任意行为。

examination_example.sentence: Efforts in Canada have been arguably languid at best, and have given us a situation where we frequently hear of employers begging for <highlight>workers</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 加拿大付出的努力充其量还是不够，这也使我们经常听到雇主央求招聘员工的情况发生。

examination_example.sentence: Even so, employers complain they aren't given all the <highlight>workers</highlight> they need.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即便如此，雇主们仍抱怨他们未能获得他们需要的足够的劳工。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
